## Course overview

We will cover the following topics in this crash course:

-   An introduction to Quarto: What is it and why is it useful?

-   Reproducible documents with Quarto for different output formats

-   Creating presentations with Quarto

-   Creating Websites with Quarto

-   Publishing documents, presentations and websites
